A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The magic of the original series was in no small part due to the chemistry of its actors. Like many\, I have waited to see Ford\, Hamill and Fisher together again on the big screen since 1983. Now it feels like I've forever been and completely cheated of that.

The reasons to despise this movie are too many to list. The new characters are paper thin and should\, at this point\, have been fleshed out by now. The story line is all over the map and has left me feeling like "who cares what happens next". If you are one of those people who are impressed by tons of CGI and battles that make no sense at all\, this movie is for you. Otherwise\, to have the Star Wars brand on the front of this movie is an insult. 

The only thing that can save this franchise now is to have the USS Enterprise come crashing in through a wormhole to join the fight against the First Order. Unless that's in the next script\, I'll gladly wait to see Episode IX on bluray.
